summary: Iteration 54 - Mobile nav Analytics (replaces Offline), advanced analytics features (weekly trend, period comparison, hourly distribution) all working. Backend tests 9/9 passed. Frontend features verified on desktop and mobile.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS: Backend /api/analytics/guest returns weekly_trend with 4 weeks (W-3, W-2, W-1, This week)
PASS: Backend period_comparison has this_week, last_week, change_pct, trend fields
PASS: Mobile bottom nav has 6 items: Feed, Discover, Briefing, Saved, History, Analytics (no Offline, no Search)
PASS: Desktop sidebar has both Analytics AND Offline nav items
PASS: Analytics page renders WEEKLY_COMPARISON section with this_week vs last_week and % badge
PASS: Analytics page renders WEEKLY_TREND section with 4 bars
PASS: Analytics page renders PEAK_HOURS section with 24-hour distribution chart and time-of-day colors
PASS: Analytics page renders CATEGORIES section with percentage bars
PASS: Analytics page renders TOP_SOURCES section
PASS: Analytics page renders 4 stat cards (LISTENS, MINUTES, STREAK, TOP)
PASS: Mobile viewport (375x667) Analytics page - NO horizontal overflow (body:375px, viewport:375px)
PASS: Mobile viewport (375x667) Dashboard page - NO horizontal overflow (regression check passed)
PASS: DashboardSidebar.js mobile nav uses ChartBar icon for Analytics (line 17)
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click 'Oya, Play' button on landing page
seed_data_creation: Guest user has 6 listens, 2-day streak from previous iterations
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 54 adds advanced analytics: weekly_trend (4 bars), period_comparison (this_week vs last_week with change %), hourly_distribution (24-hour chart colored by time of day). Mobile nav has Analytics instead of Offline (6 items: Feed, Discover, Briefing, Saved, History, Analytics). Desktop sidebar still has Offline. All data-testid attributes working: analytics-page, period-comparison, weekly-trend, daily-activity, hourly-distribution, category-breakdown, source-breakdown, stat-listens, stat-minutes, stat-streak, stat-top.

mobile_nav_analytics.notes: Mobile bottom nav has Analytics (ChartBar icon) instead of Offline. 6 items total: Feed, Discover, Briefing, Saved, History, Analytics

mobile_analytics_overflow.notes: Mobile viewport (375x667) Analytics page - body:375px, viewport:375px, NO overflow

weekly_comparison_section.notes: WEEKLY_COMPARISON shows this_week vs last_week with % change badge

weekly_trend_section.notes: WEEKLY_TREND shows 4 bars: W-3, W-2, W-1, This week

peak_hours_section.notes: PEAK_HOURS (hourly-distribution) shows 24-hour chart with time-of-day icons (Moon, Sun, SunHorizon)

categories_section.notes: CATEGORIES section shows category breakdown with percentage bars

stat_cards.notes: 4 stat cards: LISTENS (6), MINUTES (9), STREAK (2d), TOP (TECH)

desktop_sidebar_analytics_offline.notes: Desktop sidebar has both Analytics AND Offline nav items

backend_weekly_trend.notes: GET /api/analytics/guest returns weekly_trend with 4 weeks [W-3, W-2, W-1, This week]

backend_period_comparison.notes: period_comparison has this_week, last_week, change_pct, trend fields

mobile_dashboard_overflow_regression.notes: Mobile Dashboard page has zero horizontal overflow (regression check)
